album.title: One Love: The Very Best Of...

track.name: Stir It Up
comments: Does anybody know the faster Version of this Song? It's rather more danceable, like the Fugees-Version of "No Woman No Cry". I've known it from the Radio, but I can't find it and don't know if it's by Bob Marley or whom else!
This is such a timeless song
one of my all time favourite from the man himself...

Rowan Marley prints "Stir it up" on every bag of his organically grown coffee.
One Love!
THE ONE AND ONLY BOB MARLEY
One of my most favorite songs ever! Reminds me of when I was a little girl with a half baked summer brain xD
Now how could you possibly hate the beauty of this music?
